name: WP Caregiver
author: Blintux

sections.description:
With this plugin you can turn on/off some theme and core services of WordPress or even you can customize it too.

Frontend features

  • Remove generator meta tag
  • Remove RSD (Really Simple Discovery ) link
  • Remove Windows Live Writer link
  • Remove post relational links (prev, next)
  • Remove canonical link
  • Remove RSS feed links
  • Remove admin bar
  • Remove the Website URL field from the comment form
  • Remove allowed HTML tags text from the comment form
  • Quick maintenance
  • Force login
  • Open Graph meta tag generator

Backend features

  • Disable core (WordPress) update notification
  • Disable plugins update notification
  • Disable themes update notification
  • Hide login error messages
  • Define custom login error message
  • Enable “All Settings” item in Settings menu
  • Enable Link Manager feature
  • Enable Featured image support
  • Enable excerpt field for pages
  • Enable TinyMCE Editor for excerpt
  • Enable categories for pages
  • Display IDs in post/page list
  • Customize WP Mail
  • Remove WordPress version from footer

System information

  • Server time
  • Memory usage
  • SQL Queries
  • Post revisions
  • Disc usage

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin from wordpress.
  2. Extract all the files.
  3. Upload everything (keeping the directory structure) to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
I made a translation file. How to add?

Send it via E-Mail to <blintux [@t] gmail [dot] com> and I have implemented this for the next release of the plugin.

I found a bug. How do I report this?

If you think you’ve found a bug, please post your findings here on the support forum.
sections.changelog:
Versione 0.3.0

  • New feature: Custom login error message
  • New feature: Remove allowed HTML tags text from the comment form
  • New feature: Enable categories for pages
  • Bugfix: Remove admin bar not work correctly
  • Bugfix: Excerpt TinyMCE Editor line wrap problem
  • All function compatible with WordPress 3.7
  • Supported WordPress versions: 3.6 – 3.7

Versione 0.2.1

  • Fix for missing css and js files

Versione 0.2.0

  • Added disc usage info
  • Added Open Graph meta tag generator (og:title, og:description, og:url, og:image, og:type, og:site_name)
  • Added translation support
  • Added Hungarian language file
  • Interface improvements
  • Bug fixes

Versione 0.1.1

  • Fixed admin access issue in quick maintenance mode

Versione 0.1.0

  • First Release

short_description: Adds many options for tweaking frontend and backend of your WordPress site.
